comments.author: Matt Steele
comments.message:
A few suggestions:
Put the clock tick sound on the page
Make the default video Jack Bauer yelling Damnit!
Stop using sensible technical phrases and start uttering gibberish.

comments.author: Jonathan Sharp
comments.message: Is it Web 2.0 compatible with AJAX? Oh, and what port do you need to open to send it to my screen?

comments.author: Zach Leatherman
comments.message: It's HTML 5 and doesn't use Flash! Fully compatible with the iPad and multi-touch!
